pyCE¶

Introduction¶

Welcome to pyCE, a Python2.7 library for configurational entropy projects. This library is being developed based on the work done in Marcelo Gleiser’s Research Group in the Department of Physics and Astronomy at Dartmouth College. During development this ReadTheDocs will be regularly updated.

Test here:

print 'hello'
>> hello
Hello:This field has a short field name, so aligning the field body with the first line is feasible.

This paragraph belongs to a second-level block quote.
what
Definition lists associate a term with a definition.
how
The term is a one-line phrase, and the definition is one or more paragraphs or body elements, indented relative to the term.
